thread.title: Shark bites surfer off Hawaii coast, leaving him in critical condition

title: Shark bites surfer off Hawaii coast, leaving him in critical condition
text:
Published By: Reuters - Environment - Today 
HONOLULU (Reuters) - A 25-year-old surfer was bitten by a shark off the famed North Shore on Hawaii's island of Oahu on Friday, and the man ...
